DNT
Talk to Grimbeorn
'[placeholder], I am glad that you have visited my home. You have been a great help and voice of reason. You are always welcome here, my friend.'
'My #-1:[placeholder]#-1:{kin-daughter[f]|kin-son}, it is good to share my table with you again.'
Enjoy a moment's rest.
'Eat, eat. There is food enough for all of us.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Sit</rgb> down for a meal.

'A Beorninghús feast is one of my favourite things! It is kind of you to volunteer to help us prepare for the feast.

'[placeholder], I must finish preparing the food. If you would please help set the table, we will be ready for the guests. Do not worry about the time! Rose, Star, Bud, Sprout, Lily, Violet, Cream, Lady, Clover, Honey-bun, Honey-pie, and Leaf will help you out! Thank you kindly, [placeholder].

'Oh and some of the food will be out shortly to put on the table.'

'I can see you are ready for the feast, #-1:[placeholder]#-1:{kin-daughter[f]|kin-son}!

'[placeholder], I must finish preparing the food. If you would please help set the table, we will be ready for the guests. Do not worry about the time! Rose, Star, Bud, Sprout, Lily, Violet, Cream, Lady, Clover, Honey-bun, Honey-pie, and Leaf will help you out!

'Oh and some of the food will be out shortly to put on the table.'
You collect some nuts for the table from Lily
You collect some fruit for the table from Violet
<rgb=#FF0000>Sit</rgb> down for a meal
Grimbeorn invites many family members and guests to a feast.
Enjoy a meal.
